scripts.dev:local: npm run config:local && npm run dev
scripts.dev:testnet: npm run config:testnet && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run copy-payment-keys && vite build && npm run copy-pay-keys
scripts.build:local: npm run config:local && npm run build
scripts.build:testnet: npm run config:testnet && npm run build
scripts.copy-payment-keys: mkdir -p public/keys public/zkir && cp ../pay-api/public/keys/* public/keys/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp ../pay-api/public/zkir/* public/zkir/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Payment circuit keys copied from pay-api to pay-ui'
scripts.copy-pay-keys: echo 'Keys and zkir copied automatically by Vite from public/ to dist/'
